description: Material: Nylon fibre backrest with breathable mesh, PU moulded seat with 45-55 density, Chrome finish base and nylon fibre castors. Mini Syncro mechanism: You can lock your office chair in any position with knee tilt to support your body's natural movements. The chair is with adjustable Arm Rests, adjustable arm rest gives a very good comfort to your hands when you are on your desk. Executive Office Chair: Executive office chair with mesh back for breathability; High-back office chair with a professional and executive look provides day-long comfort. Diamensions (L x W x H) in cm and Weight in kg: 66 x 64 x 125 and 14.98. Soft cushioned lumbar support.
